summary: A country boy becomes the head of a gang through the purchase of some lucky roses from an old lady. He and a singer at the gang's nightclub try to do a good deed for the old lady when her daughter comes to visit.
cast: Jackie Chan|Anita Mui|Ah-Lei Gua|Chun-Hsiung Ko|Wu Ma|Bill Tung|Kenny Bee|Anthony Carpio|Anthony Chan|Ching-Wan Chan|Joanna Chan|Kwok-Kuen Chan|Sai-Tang Chan|Tat-Kwong Chan|Wai-Yue Chan|Paul Che|Chih Hua Chen|Jing Chen|Ti-Ko Chen|Lawrence Cheng|Jacky Cheung|Siu Cheung|Tsan-Sang Cheung|Wah Cheung|Huang Chin|Wellson Chin|Calvin Choi|Remus Choi|Yuen Chor|Billy Chow|Kong Chow|Michael Man-Kin Chow|Tau Chu|Tiet Wo Chu|Ju Fang|Kong Fong|Hark-On Fung|Chi Man Ho|Chi Hsiang|Ricky Hui|Regina Kent|Elvina Kong|Kin Kwan|Suki Kwan|Keung-Kuen Lai|Rocky Lai|Siu-Tin Lai|Man-Chung Lam|Billy Lau|Siu-Ming Lau|Lan Law|Chun Kit Lee|Hoi Sang Lee|Kin-sang Lee|Pei-ling Lee|Bo-Jing Leung|See-Ho Leung|Wen-Tai Li|Han Ling|Ken Lo|Lieh Lo|Pui Lok|Hung Lu|Fong Lui|Ray Lui|Vincent Lyn|Kei Mai|Tin-Yan Mak|Mars|Anders Nelsson|Man-Tat Ng|Richard Ng|Kuang Ni|Joe Nieh|Louis Roth|Kai San|Yee Seung|John Sham|Yu Shangkuan|Fui-On Shing|Ga-Ban Shing|Wan-Gat Shing|Wai Shum|Edmond So|Chi Wai Tai|San Tai|Yun-Hui Tai|Tai-Bo|Yat Ching Tam|Ching Tien|Feng Tien|Kan-Wing Tsang|Chien-Po Tsen|Mang Tso|Kwong Lam Tsui|Chi Shing Wan|Wei Wang|Dick Wei|Ping-Ou Wei|James Wong|Melvin Wong|Pauline Yuk-Wan Wong|Shu-Tong Wong|Sun Wong|Fung Woo|Zhilun Xue|Simon Yam|Mondi Yau|Amy Yip|Gloria Yip|Ha-Lei Yip|Biao Yuen|Rik Thomas
title: Mr. Canton & Lady Rose - Gángster para un pequeño milagro
